discover.dev_week_2024_card.heading: Welcome to Developer Week
discover.dev_week_2024_card.body: A week-long series of product announcements, technical deep dives, and events to enhance the developer experience and fuel productivity.
discover.birthday_week_2024_card.heading: Welcome to Birthday Week
discover.birthday_week_2024_card.body: 2024 marks Cloudflare's 14th birthday. Every day this week we'll announce new products and host discussions with experts, customers, and industry peers to celebrate.
